Phoenix/Pumpskin/Flicker::

Phoenix watches Starstorm in the CR as Pumpskin loads Nightviper in a 
seperate tank.  Flicker comes up behind her and gently touches her 
shoulder, startling her.

"Wha?- oh, Flicker, it's you."  The pair of them embrace each other, 
not really noticing Pumpskin vanishing into the bowels of the base 
once again.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> Starstorm fell in stasis lock and started reparation process
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Phoenix::
> > 
> > "He'll be all right," Phoenix reassures her.  She doesn't mention 
> the 
> > fact that it depends on Pumpskin staying coherent long enough to 
> get 
> > his charge to the medbay.  Starstorm is upset enough already.
> > 
> > Phoenix carries her friend to the CR chambers.  Pumpskin's long 
> legs 
> > let him catch up just then, with the battered Nightviper draped 
in 
> > his arms, like a long, thin rag.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Starstorm:
> > > 
> > > "NightViper!!!!"yelled Starstorm but she was too weak to resist
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Phoenix::
> > > > 
> > > > "The only place you're going is the CR," Phoenix says 
> decisively, 
> > > > scooping up her friend and flying home with her.
